text: A lawmaker from Australia ’ s conservative ruling party proposed to his gay partner in parliament Monday just moments after a bill paving the way for same - sex marriage was introduced. Tim Wilson, who has reportedly been engaged to Ryan Bolger for nine years, fought back tears as he thanked his fiancé for enduring a marriage debate that “ has been the soundtrack to our relationship ”. “ In my first speech I defined our bond by the ring that sits on both of our left hands – that they are the answer to the questions we can not ask, ” said the 37 - year - old. “ So there is only one thing left to do : Ryan Patrick Bolger will you marry me? ” Bolger, who was sitting in the public gallery, quickly responded “ yes ” as the floor erupted in applause. “
